General.Name: MiMedia Holdings Inc.
General.Description: MiMedia Holdings Inc. provides a consumer cloud platform. Its platform enables various types of personal media to be secured in the cloud across devices and on all operating systems. The company offers its cloud platform and charges a license fee for using its software. MiMedia Holdings Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 85 Broad Street, New York, NY, United States, 10004
